query:
SELECT lps.id, lps.pageId, lps.ctaButtonId, cb.text, cb.secondaryText 
FROM landing_page_settings lps
LEFT JOIN cta_buttons cb ON lps.ctaButtonId = cb.id
WHERE lps.pageId = 'black-friday';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user CNKdwDCmXxkMRsi.root --database HGQz9dLDHpFFWknD7bvAQD --execute SELECT lps.id, lps.pageId, lps.ctaButtonId, cb.text, cb.secondaryText 
FROM landing_page_settings lps
LEFT JOIN cta_buttons cb ON lps.ctaButtonId = cb.id
WHERE lps.pageId = 'black-friday';
